sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSEMSR1AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-ENC-MP2SD : This option enables 1 live SD video channel encoding using MPEG-2 MP@ML format. It can be used up to 720x576 output resolution.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSEMHR1AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-ENC-MP2HD : This option enables 1 live HD video channel encoding using MPEG-2 MP@HL format. It can be used up to 1920x1080@30fps pixels.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSEHMR1AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-ENC-MP4QVGA : This option enables 1 live QVGA video channel encoding using H.264 baseline & main profiles. It can be used to encode up to 320x240@30fps pixels.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSEHSR1AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-ENC-MP4SD : This option enables 1 live SD video channel encoding using H.264 baseline, main & high profiles. It can be used to encode up to 720x576 @25fps or 720x480@30fps pixels.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSEHHR2AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-ENC-MP4HD : This option enables 1 live HD video channel encoding using H.264 baseline, main & high profiles. It can be used to encode up to 1920x1080@30fps pixels.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSEAMP0AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-ENC-AUD20 : This option enables 1 live stereo audio channel encoding using MPEG-1 L2, AAC-LC, HE-AAC V1 or HE-AAC V2 formats.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSEADD0AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-ENC-DD51 : This option enables 1 live multichannel audio channel encoding using AC3 or E-AC3 formats. It can be used to encode 1 multichannel 5.1 audio or up to 3 stereo audios.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSFLEX1AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-FLX : This Flextream option is valid for one encoding channel. This option allows one video encoder (SD/HD) to be assigned within a pool of encoders that are located on Electra VS, on the SAME SITE and that are sharing the bandwidth.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSSCR00AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-SCR-OTT : This option enables WebTV/OTT scrambling output. It performs AES-128 encryption. One licence is required per WebTV output.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSFEL00AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-FILE : This option enables file-based encoding on 1 server. It supports MPEG-2 TS input format. It supports MPEG-2 TS, mp4, HLS, Smooth Streaming & MPEG-Dash output formats.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSDHSR1AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-DEC-SD : This option enables 1 live SD video channel decoding using MPEG-2 or H.264 . It can decode up to 720x576@25fps pixels or 720x480@30fps pixels.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSDHHR1AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-DEC-HD : This option enables 1 live HD video channel decoding using MPEG-2 or H.264. It can decode up to 1920x1080@30fps pixels.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSDAMP0AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-DEC-AUD20 : This option enables 1 live audio stereo channel decoding using MPEG-1 L2, AAC-LC, HE-AAC V1 or HE-AAC V2 formats.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSDADD0AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-DEC-DD51 : This option enables 1 multichannel audio decoding using AC3 or E-AC3 formats. It can be used to decode 1 multichannel 5.1 audio or up to 3 stereo audios.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSDADDEAA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-DEC-DE : This option enables 1 Dolby E audio decoding channel.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSFEL01AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-FILE-SCR-OTT : This option enables WebTV scrambling for file encoding.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSDHSR2AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-DEC-SD-MEZZA : This option enables 1 live SD video channel decoding using MPEG-2/H.264 (4:2:2/4:2:0 8bit/10bit) at high bit rate. It can be used to decode up 720x576 pixels@25fps pixels or 720x480@30fps pixels.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSDHHR2AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-DEC-HD-MEZZA : This option enables 1 live HD video channel decoding using MPEG-2/H.264 (4:2:2/4:2:0 8/10bit) at high bit rate. It can be used to decode up 1920x1080 pixels@30fps pixels.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSALC00AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-ALC20 : This option allows Automatic Loudness Control on one stereo pair.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSALC01AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-ALC51 : This option allows Automatic Loudness Control on one multichannel 5.1 audio or for 3 stereo audios.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSEAMP1AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-ENC-AAC51 : This option enables 1 live multichannel audio channel encoding AAC. It can be used to encode 1 multichannel 5.1 audio or up to 3 (AAC/MPEG-1L2) stereo audios.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSDAMP1AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-DEC-AAC51 : This option enables 1 multichannel audio decoding using AAC. It can be used to decode 1 multichannel 5.1 AAC audio or up to 3 stereo (AAC/MPEG-1L2) audios.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSFEL02AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-FILE-PRE : This option enables file-based encoding on 1 server. It supports MPEG-2 TS format or mp4 file format input. It supports up to 4k H.264/HEVC encoding over MPEG-2 TS, mp4, HLS, Smooth Streaming & MPEG-Dash output formats.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSEEMR1AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-ENC-HEVCQVGA : This option enables 1 live QVGA video channel encoding using HEVC main profile. It can be used to encode up to 320x240@30fps pixels.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSEESR1AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-ENC-HEVCSD : This option enables 1 live SD video channel encoding using HEVC main profile. It can be used to encode up to 720x576@25fps or 720x480@30fps pixels

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSEEHR2AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-ENC-HEVCHD : This option enables 1 live HD video channel encoding using HEVC main profile. It can be used to encode up to 1920x1080@30fps pixels.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSOFL00AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-SW-VOSFLEX : This option enables the VOS Flex video system on 1 server. This license is required for every 1RU platform or blade in the Electra VS system.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSEEHR4AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-ENC-HEVCUHD : This option enables 1 live UHD or 4 HD video channels encoding using HEVC main profile (4:2:0). This option is only valid with the ELC-VS-HW-UHD hardware option.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSDE4R1AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-DEC-HEVCUHD : This option enables 1 live UHD video channel decoding using HEVC. It can be used to decode up 3840x2160 pixels@60fps pixels

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSDEHR1AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-DEC-HEVCHD : This option enables 1 live HD video channel decoding using HEVC. It can be used to decode up 1920x1080 pixels@30fps pixels.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSDESR1AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-DEC-HEVCSD : This option enables 1 live SD video channel decoding using HEVC. It can be used to decode up 720x576 pixels@25fps pixels or 720x480@30fps pixels.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSTAES1AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-TX-AES67 : This option enables the transmission of an audio channel using AES-67 standard.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSRAES2AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-RX-AES67 : This option enables the reception of an audio channel using AES-67 standard.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSSHDR2AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-HDR-HLG : This option enables processing of HDR HLG signals for one video source.

sGetVersions:LicItem.Name: EVSSHDR1AA
sGetVersions:LicItem.Desc: ELC-VS-LIC-HDR-PQ : This option enables processing of HDR SMPTE 2084 PQ signals for one video source.
